system.description:
When you attempt to defeat an enemy you hold an advantage over, tell us what you want to do to them and roll the appropriate stat.

If you do not have an advantage over them, you cannot attempt to Finish Them. An Advantage is something you need to get the upper hand, such as teamwork, the element of surprise, or a moment's hesitation.

If you Finish Them by...
...trying to kill them, roll +Blood. 

...forcing them to retreat, roll +Courage. 

...outsmarting, terrifying, or overwhelming them, roll +Grace. 

...disabling them or knocking them out, roll +Sense. 

...showing them the error of their ways, roll +Wisdom. 

---- 

If you Finish Them using a weapon with Ammo, use 1 Ammo. If you have no Ammo, you cannot Finish Them with that weapon.

If you have the Clumsy tag, you take -1 to Finish Them.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value: You lose the advantage, and must face retaliation.

partial.label: Partial success.
partial.value: You deal damage to them and lose your advantage over them. If an ally was Keeping Them Busy, they aren't anymore.

success.label: Success!
success.value:
If you Finish Them by...
...trying to kill them, they die by your hand.

...forcing them to retreat, they back off. They won't be back anytime soon.

...outsmarting, terrifying, or overwhelming them, they admit defeat, and will not willingly challenge you again.

...disabling them or knocking them out, they are physically incapacitated and unable to continue.

...showing them the error of their ways, you Forge a Bond with them, and they cannot bring themselves to hurt you.
